author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Following the discussion in https://mattermost.web.cern.ch/cms-o-and-c/pl/jwfa7decrjda9jwrgepmw36woy this PR extends `edmProvDump` to print out the ProductID of each product (or if that is not possible for any reason, the BranchID`). Since, in principle, the BranchID-to-ProductID mapping can depend on the Event, a new command line parameter `--entryForProductID` is added to specify the Event entry of the argument file (defaults to entry 0).

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests run. `edmProvDump` of a file shows ProductID for products, also for dropped products.
title: Add printout of ProductID (or BranchID) to edmProvDump
